title: Panel, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic thread
Technique: slit tapestry weave with painted details
description: Pictorial panel showing a competition between men on horses and men on foot brandishing swords or spears in a rocky landscape. Each side is observed and encouraged by its leaders, each seated behind a table. The contest continues beyond the leaders and has figures rendered in muted shades of purple, blue, and violet. A narrow border with a vine and blossoms and bats on a purple ground is continuous on all four sides. Four sides are trimmed with ivory satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, ca. 1900.Medium: silk and metallic thread
Technique: slit tapestry weave with painted details. 1968-27-3.
